info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 12:50PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Union and northwestern Wallowa Counties through 145 PM PDT... At 1249 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Minam, or 30 miles northeast of La Grande, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Minam and Flora. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
